FulfillmentStepSource.name: FulfillmentStepSource
FulfillmentStepSource.description: Represents a link between a fulfillment step and the corresponding order lines.

Name.description: An automatically generated name for the fulfillment step source.

SourceIdentifier.description: The identifier of the source order line item (order item or fulfillment order line).

StepId.description: The identifier of the fulfillment step.

VersionGroupIdentifier.description: The ID of the version group that's assigned to the fulfillment step source item. This field is available in API version 64.0 and later.
